function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy consumption by public lighting and other systems","Impact":"Increase in energy costs, environmental impact, and strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Implementing energy-efficient technologies, optimizing lighting schedules, and promoting energy conservation practices","Technologies":"LED lighting, motion sensors, smart lighting controls","People":"City residents, municipal government, environmental organizations","Owner":"Municipal government, energy management companies"},{"Description":"Potential impact of social distancing measures on service energy consumption","Impact":"Disruption of services, reduced efficiency, and potential increase in energy costs","Mitigation":"Remote service delivery, energy-efficient equipment, and optimization of service processes","Technologies":"Online service platforms, energy-efficient appliances, process automation systems","People":"Service providers, city residents","Owner":"Service providers, municipal government"},{"Description":"Limited impact of lockdown measures on energy use by systems","Impact":"Inability to address energy efficiency of systems due to focus on lockdown measures","Mitigation":"Establish specific energy efficiency initiatives for systems, conduct comprehensive assessment of energy use by systems","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, performance analytics tools, energy auditing technologies","People":"City residents, municipal government, energy management companies","Owner":"Municipal government"}]}
